summary: The client requested deletion and re-addition of NFR-004 to remove erroneous sprint tracking fields. PM Sarah confirmed the action was completed, with fields cleaned up and the item returned to the backlog as high-priority.

decisions.title: Delete and re-add NFR-004 with cleanup
decisions.details: Removed sprint assignment, velocity estimates, and status trackers to focus on role-based access control post-authentication

backlog_deltas.title: Cleaned up erroneous sprint tracking fields and refocused on core requirements; moved back to backlog as high-priority
